title: Ticket #3152: RFE: file transfer plugins for stdin (input)
description:
cmd = /bin/cat
output = test.out
input = stdinfile
transfer_input_files = data://HelloWorld/stdinfile
queue

It is desirable to be able to pass the output of a file transfer plugin as stdin to a job. This does not work because condor_submit tries to fine "stdinfile", which won't exist until after the data plugin is invoked.

NOTE: This example assumes data_plugin uses "://" as the start of data instead of "," (current as of 7.9.0 and earlier)
